casebody.data:
Ernest BILLIZONE, Sr.
v.
LOUISIANA DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY AND CORRECTIONS NO. 2017-CI-0179 Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 27, 2018

Writ not considered* Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
